mapper.sql: select sss.id, sss.user_id, sss.shengou_id, sss.code, sss.all_code, sss.name, sss.sg_fx_price, sss.sg_hy_rate, sss.sg_num, sss.sg_nums, sss.max_sg, sss.status, sss.money, sss.create_time, sss.update_time, sss.dj_money, sss.sg_sg_date, sss.sg_zq_jk_date, sss.sg_ss_date, sss.renjiao, sss.renjiao_time, sss.is_cc, sss.is_cc_time, sss.zq_money, sss.zq_num, sss.zq_nums, sss.freeze_profit, sss.balance, sss.old_sg_num, sss.old_sg_nums, sss.sg_type, sss.delete_flag, m.id m_id, m.username m_username, m.nickname m_nickname, -- m.password m_password, m.salt m_salt, m.mobile m_mobile, -- m.avatar m_avatar, m.successions m_successions, m.max_successions m_max_successions, m.prev_time m_prev_time, m.login_time m_login_time, -- m.login_ip m_login_ip, -- m.payment_code m_payment_code, -- m.join_ip m_join_ip, m.join_time m_join_time, m.create_time m_create_time, m.update_time m_update_time, m.status m_status, m.balance m_balance, m.superior_name m_superior_name, m.superior_code m_superior_code, m.superior_id m_superior_id, m.institution_number m_institution_number, m.daili_id m_daili_id, m.jingzhijiaoyi m_jingzhijiaoyi, m.is_pz m_is_pz, m.is_dz m_is_dz, m.is_ps m_is_ps, m.is_sg m_is_sg, m.is_zs m_is_zs, m.is_qc m_is_qc, m.is_qh m_is_qh, m.is_inform m_is_inform, m.freeze_profit m_freeze_profit, m.weiyima m_weiyima, m.name m_name, m.id_card m_id_card, m.submit_auth_time m_submit_auth_time, m.auth_time m_auth_time, m.is_auth m_is_auth, m.auth_reject_reason m_auth_reject_reason, m.auth_reject_time m_auth_reject_time, m.deposit_bank m_deposit_bank, m.khzhihang m_khzhihang, m.account_name m_account_name, m.account m_account, -- m.card_image m_card_image, m.binding_time m_binding_time, m.unbind_time m_unbind_time, m.delete_flag m_delete_flag, m.bank_card_auth m_bank_card_auth, m.withdraw_switch m_withdraw_switch from fa_stock_sg_second sss left join fa_member m on sss.user_id = m.id
mapper.insert:
insert into fa_stock_sg_second
user_id, shengou_id, code, all_code, name, sg_fx_price, sg_hy_rate, sg_num, sg_nums, max_sg, status, money, create_time, update_time, dj_money, sg_sg_date, sg_zq_jk_date, sg_ss_date, renjiao, renjiao_time, is_cc, is_cc_time, zq_money, zq_num, zq_nums, freeze_profit, balance, old_sg_num, old_sg_nums, sg_type, delete_flag,
#{userId}, #{shengouId}, #{code}, #{allCode}, #{name}, #{sgFxPrice}, #{sgHyRate}, #{sgNum}, #{sgNums}, #{maxSg}, #{status}, #{money}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{djMoney}, #{sgSgDate}, #{sgZqJkDate}, #{sgSsDate}, #{renjiao}, #{renjiaoTime}, #{isCc}, #{isCcTime}, #{zqMoney}, #{zqNum}, #{zqNums}, #{freezeProfit}, #{balance}, #{oldSgNum}, #{oldSgNums}, #{sgType}, #{deleteFlag},
mapper.delete: update fa_stock_sg_second set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update fa_stock_sg_second set delete_flag = 1 where id in
